data.message: Lol I'm just too funny I'm laughing at all the shit I write lol I'm too funny see if u can make out what is true out everything I wrote cause I found out some of it is just my opinion cause I was trying to learn a technique but I was doing it wrong I'm suppose to be relaxed and calm and slow down and wait but I was doing it fast and just talking to myself giving myself my own opinion lol  oh god I'm too funny I got to learn and my ass keeps trying
